public class MSER
extends java.lang.Object

Calculates Maximally stable extremal regions Algorithm based on Linear Time Maximally Stable Extremal Regions by David Nist_r and Henrik Stew_nius (2008)

cycltrans

protected static double[][] cycltrans(double[][] matrix,
                                      int m,
                                      int n)
implementation of cyclic translation for matrices.

Parameters:
matrix - arbitrary typed matrix to be translated
m - Shift in y-Direction = first matrix-dimension!
n - Shift in x-Direction = second matrix-dimension!
Returns:
cyclic translated matrix, e.g. cycltrans([1 2 3; 4 5 6; 7 8 9], 1,1) = [5 6 4; 8 9 7 ; 2 3 1]
